languages.text:
While the Cyber-Eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Soaring{/g}, all non-Xenos allies receive non-stacking {uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99} bonus to Resolve.
Whenever the Cyber-Eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Soaring{/g}, all non-Xenos allies receive bonus temporary wounds, dodge penetration, and parry reduction equal to their Resolve for 1 round.

traits.locale_text:
While the Cyber-Eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Soaring{/g}, all non-Xenos allies receive non-stacking {uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99} bonus to Resolve.
Whenever the Cyber-Eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Soaring{/g}, all non-Xenos allies receive bonus temporary wounds, dodge penetration, and parry reduction equal to their Resolve for 1 round.

languages.text:
While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} of all non-xenos allies is increased by +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99}. Does not stack.
Whenever the cyber-eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, all non-xenos allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, equal to their resolve. Also, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are increased by +<u>resolve</u>%. Both effects are active for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} of all non-xenos allies is increased by +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99}. Does not stack.
Whenever the cyber-eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, all non-xenos allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, equal to their resolve. Also, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are increased by +<u>resolve</u>%. Both effects are active for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text:
Пока киберорел находится {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, все не являющиеся ксеносами союзники получают +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99} к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}. Эффект не суммируется.
Когда киберорел теряет эффект {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, все не являющиеся ксеносами союзники получают {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} в количестве, равном их решимости. Также их {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижение парирования{/g} увеличиваются на процент, равный значению решимости. Оба эффекта действуют в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

Whenever the cyber-eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, all non-xenos allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, equal to their resolve. Also, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are increased by +<u>resolve</u>%. Both effects are active for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Пока киберорел находится {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, все не являющиеся ксеносами союзники получают +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99} к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}. Эффект не суммируется.
Когда киберорел теряет эффект {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, все не являющиеся ксеносами союзники получают {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} в размере, равном их решимости. Также их {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижение парирования{/g} увеличиваются на <u>значение решимости в %</u>. Оба эффекта действуют в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

Пока киберорел находится {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, все не являющиеся ксеносами союзники получают +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99} к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}. Эффект не суммируется.

Также их {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижение парирования{/g} увеличиваются на <u>значение решимости в %</u>. Оба эффекта действуют в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

Пока киберорел находится {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, все не являющиеся ксеносами союзники получают +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99} к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}. Эффект не суммируется.
Когда киберорел теряет эффект {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, все не являющиеся ксеносами союзники получают {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} в количестве, равном их решимости. Также их {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижение парирования{/g} увеличиваются на процент, равный значению решимости. Оба эффекта действуют в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

languages.text:
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}の間、非ゼノの味方全員の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99}増加する（重複しない）。
サイバーイーグルが {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g} を止めると、非ゼノの味方全員は自身の決断力に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的傷{/g}を受ける。また、彼らの {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}が +<u>決断力</u>% 増加する。両効果は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に有効。
languages.original_text:
While the cyber-eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} of all non-xenos allies is increased by +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99}. Does not stack.
Whenever the cyber-eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, all non-xenos allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, equal to their resolve. Also, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are increased by +<u>resolve</u>%. Both effects are active for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}の間、非ゼノの味方全員の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99}増加する（重複しない）。
サイバーイーグルが {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g} を止めると、非ゼノの味方全員は自身の決断力に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的傷{/g}を受ける。また、彼らの {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}が +<u>決断力</u>% 増加する。両効果は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に有効。

languages.text:
Tant que le cyber-aigle est en {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}vol{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g} de tous ses alliés hors xénos augmente de +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99}. Non cumulable.
Quand le cyber-aigle cesse de {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}voler{/g}, tous ses alliés hors xénos gagnent un bonus aux {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} égal à leur Détermination. De plus, leur {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} et leur {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g} sont accrues de +<u>resolve</u> %. Les effets durent 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Whenever the cyber-eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, all non-xenos allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, equal to their resolve. Also, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are increased by +<u>resolve</u>%. Both effects are active for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Tant que le cyber-aigle est en {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}vol{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g} de tous ses alliés hors xénos augmente de +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99}. Non cumulable.
Quand le cyber-aigle cesse de {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}voler{/g}, tous ses alliés hors xénos gagnent un bonus aux {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} égal à leur Détermination. De plus, leur {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} et leur {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g} sont accrues de +<u>resolve</u> %. Les effets durent 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text:
Mientras la ciberáguila está {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} de todos los aliados no xenos aumenta en +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99}. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
Cuando la ciberáguila deja de estar {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, todos los aliados no xenos ganan {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}, iguales a su firmeza. Además, su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g} aumentan en un +<u>firmeza</u> %. Ambos efectos permanecen activos durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

Whenever the cyber-eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, all non-xenos allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, equal to their resolve. Also, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are increased by +<u>resolve</u>%. Both effects are active for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Mientras la ciberáguila está {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} de todos los aliados no xenos aumenta en +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99}. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
Cuando la ciberáguila deja de estar {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, todos los aliados no xenos ganan {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}, iguales a su firmeza. Además, su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g} aumentan en un +<u>firmeza</u> %. Ambos efectos permanecen activos durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text:
当生化猎鹰处于{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，所有非异形盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}提高{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99}点。此效果无法叠加。
当生化猎鹰结束{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，所有非异形盟友获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于该盟友的决心。此外，所有非异形盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}提高<u>决心</u>%。上述所有效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

Also, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are increased by +<u>resolve</u>%. Both effects are active for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

当生化猎鹰结束{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，所有非异形盟友获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于该盟友的决心。此外，所有非异形盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}提高<u>决心</u>%。上述所有效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text:
Während der Cyber-Adler {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreist{/g}, erhöht sich die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} aller Verbündeten mit Ausnahme von Xenos um +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99}. Nicht stapelbar.
Hört der Cyber-Adler auf zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}, erhalten alle Verbündeten mit Ausnahme von Xenos ihrer Entschlossenheit entsprechende {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}. Außerdem erhöht sich ihre {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g} um +<u>resolve</u> %. Beide Effekte sind 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang aktiv.

languages.text:
Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükseldiğinde{/g} zeno olmayan tüm dost birimlerin {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değerleri +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99} kadar artar. Etki üst üste birikmez.
Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeyi{/g} bıraktığında zeno olmayan tüm dost birimler, kararlılık değerleri kadar {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}savuşturma azaltımı{/g} değerleri, +%<u>kararlılık</u> kadar artar. Her iki etki de 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca aktif kalır.

traits.locale_text:
Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükseldiğinde{/g} zeno olmayan tüm dost birimlerin {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değerleri +{uip|ResolveBonus|8ab6e0555aba4bb691a9e01fce6bef99} kadar artar. Etki üst üste birikmez.
Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeyi{/g} bıraktığında zeno olmayan tüm dost birimler, kararlılık değerleri kadar {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}savuşturma azaltımı{/g} değerleri, +%<u>kararlılık</u> kadar artar. Her iki etki de 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca aktif kalır.
